page.title: 13Churches in the Chard Area
page.content: Three denominations are represented in the block.They are the{Evangelical {Gospel Hall,}which is on the Western fringe of Chard and holds two services each Sunday plus a Sunday School and two young people's organisations.The other non_conformist cause is the {Baptist Chapel at Wadeford}which is under the aegis of{Chard Baptist {Church.}They meet weekly in the summer and monthly in the winter and have approximately ten members. {Whitestaunton}has the parish church of St.Andrew.Services are held weekly but rotate around Early Morning Communion,Matins and Evensong.The parish now has no priest of its own but is cared for by the Vicar of {Combe St.Nicholas.} In{Chard cemetery}there is a non denominational chapel where burial services are held.
